Posts.Content: HI MY WIFE HAD LIVER CANCER AND CHEMO IT DID SHRINK THE CANCER AFTER THE FIRST 3 MONTHS, BUT WILL NEVER GET TO KNOW IF IT SHRUNK ANY MORE AS UNFORTUNATLY SHE PASSED AWAY FROM A PULMINARY EMBOLISM, IF YOUR FEET OR LEGS SWELL, BE AWARE THAT A CLOT COULD BE FORMING AND GET TREATMENT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE ITS OK TO BE SCARED I HOPE YOU ARE NOT ALONE IN THIS IF I CAN BE OF ANY HELP, MY EMAIL ADDRESS IS KEITH.BAYMAN@BTINTERNET.COM, GOOD LUCK
Posts.Title: liver secondaries
